short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new tab of your choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prizm Search is a dynamic Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience with a versatile search bar and a collection of social media icons, all against a backdrop that reflects unique style.

By clicking “add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the  “THE PRIZM SEARCH” owned and operated by XTRACTMEDIA LTD. extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use  and Privacy Policy.

With Prizm Search, you no longer need to switch between search engines. Our integrated search bar harnesses the power of the Being search engine, delivering accurate and relevant search results right at your fingertips. Whether you're searching for information, looking up news, or exploring the web, Prizm Search has got you covered.

But that's not all. We understand the importance of staying connected with your favorite social media platforms. Prizm Search provides a convenient array of social media icons, allowing you to access your preferred networks with a single click. From Facebook to Instagram, Twitter to LinkedIn, and many more, you can effortlessly navigate through your social feeds and engage with your online communities.

Terms of Use: http://prizmsearch.com/term-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://prizmsearch.com/privacy-policy-2/
